CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1970 reads;" All In Pants- Both the male and female models scored when they appeared in recent "It's A Man's World" Fashion Show sponsored by the Pittsburgh Young Adult Club of the National Association of Negro Business and Professional Women's Clubs, Inc. Held at Loendi Club, this quintet paused between scenes for the photographer to capture them in the above picture.  From left to right: Bill Washington, Nancy Wells, Jimmy Wright, Wanda Bowie and Walt Simms."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eleven women and one man, including Beverly Smith, third from right and Mays? on far right; back row standing on carpeted platform for the "It's a Man's World" fashion show in Loendi Club
